justification: Correctly notes B’s QB surplus and offers a ‘workhorse’ RB plus a veteran slot WR that could appeal. But it overlooks B’s floor-first mindset (both incoming pieces carry variance) and that B already has strong RBs. The claim A “upgrades TE” is incorrect (A has a Tier 1 TE; Justin Wright is Out/Tier 5). A’s stated preference for dual-threat QBs also conflicts with targeting Tyler Miller. Rationale is concise but superficial.
